body:
fixes #12011

Modifications:
 - [x] Apple Clang is a compiler of its own. 
 - [x] All places referring to "-apple" suffix have been updated.
 - [x] Updated all packages in the built-in repository

Added to the v0.15.0 project since this change will be somewhat backward incompatible.
title: Separate Apple Clang from LLVM Clang
